answers.answer: Hi!I am not sure why you enjoy the vibrations in your hand.  This can be really troublesome and if they start in your whole body then life can be really tough. You should inform your doctor, maybe this is due to low testosterone and supplementation may help. There are many other causes such as diabetes, thyroid problems etc which should be investigated.Since a confirmed diagnosis cannot be given on net please consult your doctor regarding this. Hope this helps. Take care!The medical advice given should not be considered a substitute for medical care provided by a doctor who can examine you. The advice may not be completely correct for you as the doctor cannot examine you and does not know your complete medical history. Hence this reply to your post should only be considered as a guiding line and you must consult your doctor at the earliest for your medical problem.
Sounds like pinched nerve to me, but...in both hands? So maybe not...

question: I've been getting intense vibrations in my hands almost electric and I enjoy it.. I just wish there were a reason. Now I know its related to how I had testicular cancer but didnt get kemo (just surgery). I'm wondering could the vibrations be focused,expanded, and usedThis discussion is related to/posts/Neurology/vibrations-throughout-body/show/295900.
title: I like it
